English: What do you like to do in your free time?
I enjoy reading books and watching movies.
French: J'aime lire des livres et regarder des films.

English: He is playing soccer with his friends.
French: Il joue au football avec ses amis.

English: She likes to paint and draw.
We are going for a walk in the park.
French: Nous allons faire une promenade dans le parc.
